entry.title: Holoseat - Bug #273: walk forward character being typed when Holoseat is off
entry.content: Just a note that I finally saw this behavior the other day. No idea what is causing it. My guess is it could be board related, so going to leave it open until we switch boards and see how the new board behaves.

entry.title: Holoseat - Bug #273: walk forward character being typed when Holoseat is off
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to Closed

Haven't seen this in the latest firmware. Marking closed for now.
